item.title: Dozens arrested in India over alleged 5-year sexual abuse of teen girl
item.description: Authorities in southern India have detained almost 50 men suspected of repeatedly raping and sexually abusing a girl from the age of 13.

item.title: 5 shot dead in Mexican town; body parts found in Gulf coast region
item.description: Five people were gunned down on the same street where another attack left eight dead just months earlier.

item.title: Pam Bondi, Trump's attorney general pick, to appear for confirmation hearing
item.description: Pam Bondi served as Florida's attorney general and represented President-elect Donald Trump during his first impeachment proceedings.

item.title: Marco Rubio to face senators at confirmation hearing for secretary of state
item.description: Sen. Marco Rubio, President-elect Donald Trump's pick for secretary of state, will face questions from his Senate colleagues on Wednesday morning.

item.title: Impeached South Korean president detained over martial law declaration
item.description: South Korea's anti-corruption agency detains impeached President Yoon Suk Yeol over his brief declaration of martial law.
